  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(Survey survey) throws FormatException
      Inserts an instance of Survey in the database
      Parameters:
      survey - an instance of Survey
      Throws:
      FormatException

    • get

      Survey get(int id) throws NotFoundException
      Finds the survey identified by id in the database
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the survey to be found
      Returns:
      an instance of Survey if there is a survey identified by id, null otherwise
      Throws:
      NotFoundException

    • getByText

      Iterable<Survey> getByText(String text) throws NotFoundException
      Finds the Survey in the database where text is contained in the name of the survey
      Parameters:
      text - the text to be found in the name of the survey
      Returns:
      a list of Surveys where the text is contained in the name of the survey
      Throws:
      NotFoundException

    • getByCreator

      Iterable<Survey> getByCreator(int userId) throws NotFoundException
      Finds the Surveys in the database created by the user identified with userId
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user who created the survey
      Returns:
      a list of Surveys created by the user identified with userId
      Throws:
      NotFoundException

    • getByTextLazy

      Iterable<Survey> getByTextLazy(String text, int offset, int limit) throws NotFoundException
      Finds the Survey in the database where text is contained in the name of the survey with Lazy Loading
      Parameters:
      text - the text to be found in the name of the survey
      offset -
      limit -
      Returns:
      a list of Surveys the text is contained in the name of the survey
      Throws:
      NotFoundException
